channel.title: Decline trade errors
channel.description:
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Hot twins. java.lang.NullPointerException at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:2774) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17395) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18984) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:278) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Error with player 4, Hot twins java.lang.NullPointerException at client.declineTrade(client.java:10300) at client.declineTrade(client.java:10272) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:287) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Game saved for player Hot twins Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Blacksabath. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.declineTrade(client.java:10300) at client.declineTrade(client.java:10276) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:12743) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18984) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:278) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Hot twins. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.tradeReq(client.java:20880) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16562) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18984) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:278) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
does anybody know why when i click decline on trade how to fix it cause i log out when i decline trade can anybody help me plox.

item.title: Decline trade errors
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

public void giveItems() {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
try {
for (GameItem item: other.offeredItems) {
if (item.id > 0) {
addItem2(item.id, item.amount);
//println(“TradeConfirmed, item=”+item.id);

      }
    }
    closeInterface();
    tradeResetNeeded = true;
  } catch (Exception e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
  }
}

}
is that the trade thing in client.java
and is this the one in clickingmost
if (c.inTrade && !c.tradeConfirmed) {
c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
client other = c.getClient(c.trade_reqId);
c.tradeConfirmed = true;
if (other.tradeConfirmed) {
c.confirmScreen();
other.confirmScreen();
break;
}
c.sendFrame126(“Waiting for other player…”, 3431);
if (c.validClient(c.trade_reqId)) {
other.sendFrame126(“Other player has accepted”, 3431);
}
}
break;

		case 13218:
			client other = c.getClient(c.trade_reqId);
			if (!c.validClient(c.trade_reqId))
				break;
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 1000) {
				c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				break;
			} else {
				c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}
			c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
			if (c.inTrade && c.tradeConfirmed && other.tradeConfirmed
					&& !c.tradeConfirmed2) {
				c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				c.tradeConfirmed2 = true;
				c.actionInterval = 10000;
				c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
				if (other.tradeConfirmed2) {
					c.giveItems();
					other.giveItems();
					c.savegame(false);
					other.savegame(false);
					c.sM("Accepted trade.");
					other.sM("Accepted trade.");
					break;
				}
				other.sendQuest("Other player has accepted.", 3535);
				c.sendQuest("Waiting for other player...", 3535);
			}
			break;
